BackgroundFetchRegistrationMatch.summary: The match() method of the interface returns the first matching .
BackgroundFetchRegistrationMatch.returns:
A {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves with the first that matches
the request or if no match is found.
NOTENote: BackgroundFetchRegistration.match() is basically identical to
, except that rather than resolving with an array of
all matching records, it resolves with the first matching record only.
